output_list.reason: Integer overflow in mintToken function allows the owner to set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value.
Integer overflow in transferFrom function allows a user to set the allowance of an arbitrary user to any value.
Bad randomness in buy function allows attackers to always win and increase the contract's balance.
Access control vulnerability in sell function allows attackers to arbitrarily increase a user's balance.
Access control vulnerability in transfer function allows attackers to arbitrarily increase a user's balance.
